attributes.action: Reduce VAT to 5% for the Hospitality for 3 years whilst Loans are being repaid.
attributes.additional_details: The Hospitality & Leisure industry is still facing huge trading challenges  with energy and inflation.   These additional challenges in addition to the servicing of the Bounce Back/Recovery Loans will force many businesses into unviable trading levels.
attributes.background: We request the government to reduce the VAT back to 5% for the Hospitality & Leisure industry whilst the industry recovers and services the Bounce Back/Recovery loans.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Reinstate 5% rate of VAT for the hospitality sector
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609482
